summary: Comprehensive post-fix testing completed successfully. All previously reported issues have been resolved. Backend APIs now working at 100% success rate, tournament creation endpoint fixed, CORS configuration resolved. Frontend fully functional with excellent user experience.
passed_tests: Backend API comprehensive testing (21/21 tests passed)
Tournament creation endpoint (previously failing with 520 error)
Landing page loads correctly with hero section
Navigation between all pages (tournaments, ranking, login)
Tournament listing page with filters and search
Tournament detail pages with bracket views
Ranking page displays APA points correctly (1600, 1200, 960, etc.)
Admin panel tournament management (create, edit, delete)
Admin panel users management (10 users displayed)
Admin panel match result loading interface
